statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, conversation_text FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE conversation_text LIKE '%help%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('hour', interaction_time)) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT MAX(interaction_time) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT MIN(interaction_time) FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123456' GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('hour', interaction_time)) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT interaction_type, AVG(DATE_PART('hour', interaction_time)) FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE conversation_text LIKE '%complaint%';
SELECT AVG(interaction_time) AS avg_time FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT SUM(LENGTH(conversation_text)) AS total_text_length FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(LENGTH(conversation_text)) AS avg_text_length FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions, AVG(LENGTH(conversation_text)) AS avg_text_length FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('purchase','support');
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint' GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, conversation_text FROM customer_interactions WHERE conversation_text IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, LENGTH(conversation_text) AS text_length FROM customer_interactions WHERE conversation_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_time = (SELECT MAX(interaction_time) FROM customer_interactions);
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time, conversation_text FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint');
SELECT customer_id, interaction_time FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id = (SELECT interaction_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'support' LIMIT 1);
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, conversation_text FROM customer_interactions UNION SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, conversation_text FROM customer_interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, date FROM interactions;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, message FROM interactions WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers RIGHT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT MAX(date) FROM interactions;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(message)) FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, interactions.date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(message)) AS avg_message_length FROM interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(date) AS last_interaction_date FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, message FROM customers, interactions WHERE customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, DATE(date) AS interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers FROM interactions;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions);
SELECT name, message FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(LENGTH(message)) AS longest_message_length FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT interaction_type) AS unique_interaction_types FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, AVG(LENGTH(message)) AS avg_message_length FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(date) AS first_interaction_date FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 'some_customer_id';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'some_interaction_type';
SELECT * FROM Conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, interaction_id, customer_id FROM Conversations WHERE customer_id = 'some_customer_id';
SELECT * FROM Conversations WHERE conversation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND conversation_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Responses;
SELECT response_id, conversation_id, response_date FROM Responses WHERE conversation_id = 'some_conversation_id';
SELECT * FROM Responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01' AND response_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.interaction_date, r.response_message FROM CustomerInteractions c JOIN Conversations cv ON c.interaction_id = cv.interaction_id JOIN Responses r ON cv.conversation_id = r.conversation_id;
SELECT ci.customer_id, COUNT(ci.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions ci GROUP BY ci.customer_id;
SELECT ci.customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', ci.interaction_date - ci.interaction_date)) AS avg_days_between_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions ci GROUP BY ci.customer_id;
SELECT ci.customer_id, MAX(ci.interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions ci GROUP BY ci.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(r.response_id) AS total_responses FROM Conversations c JOIN Responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, MAX(r.response_date) AS latest_response_date FROM Conversations c JOIN Responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', r.response_date - c.conversation_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM Conversations c JOIN Responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_id, SUM(DATE_PART('day', r.response_date - c.conversation_date)) AS total_response_time FROM Conversations c JOIN Responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, MIN(ci.interaction_date) AS first_interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions ci GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, MIN(r.response_date) AS first_response_date FROM Conversations c JOIN Responses r ON c.conversation_id = r.conversation_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT ci.customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, conversation_date, response_date FROM CustomerInteractions ci JOIN Conversations cv ON ci.interaction_id = cv.interaction_id JOIN Responses r ON cv.conversation_id = r.conversation_id WHERE ci.customer_id = 'some_customer_id';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';

SELECT c.interaction_id, c.customer_id, c.interaction_date, co.conversation_id, co.conversation_date, co.conversation_notes FROM CustomerInteractions c JOIN Conversations co ON c.interaction_id = co.interaction_id WHERE c.customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';

SELECT c.interaction_id, c.interaction_date, co.conversation_id, co.conversation_date, res.response_id, res.response_date, res.response_message FROM CustomerInteractions c JOIN Conversations co ON c.interaction_id = co.interaction_id JOIN Responses res ON co.conversation_id = res.conversation_id WHERE c.customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, interaction_id, customer_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations;
SELECT * FROM responses;
SELECT response_id, conversation_id, response_date, response_content FROM responses;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_content FROM responses WHERE conversation_id = 5;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_content FROM responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations WHERE conversation_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email');
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_content FROM responses WHERE conversation_id = 789 AND response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' AND DATE(interaction_date) = '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type IS NOT NULL;

SELECT conversation_id, conversation_date, conversation_content FROM conversations INNER JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id WHERE response_date > '2022-03-15';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, COUNT(*) AS total_conversations FROM customers LEFT JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM customers LEFT JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id INNER JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(response_date, conversation_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM conversations INNER JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(response_date, conversation_date)) AS total_response_time FROM customers INNER JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id INNER JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id UNION SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, MIN(interaction_date) AS first_interaction_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT interaction_type, SUM(response_date > conversation_date) AS total_timely_responses FROM conversations INNER JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;

SELECT interaction_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(interaction_date, LAG(interaction_date) OVER (PARTITION BY customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date))) AS avg_time_between_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email';
SELECT * FROM conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_topic FROM conversations WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM responses;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_text FROM responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'chat');
SELECT name, conversation_date FROM customers JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT name, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'call';
SELECT response_text, conversation_text FROM responses JOIN conversations ON responses.conversation_id = conversations.conversation_id WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions JOIN products ON interactions.customer_id = products.product_id GROUP BY product_name;

SELECT name, conversation_topic, response_text FROM customers JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE conversation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(response_date, interaction_date)) AS avg_response_time FROM interactions JOIN responses ON interactions.interaction_id = responses.response_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE conversation_date > '2022-06-01' AND conversation_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT conversation_id, conversation_topic FROM conversations WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT response_text FROM responses WHERE conversation_id = 234;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 345;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN conversations ON customers.customer_id = conversations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN responses ON products.product_id = responses.response_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN responses ON interactions.interaction_id = responses.response_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN conversations ON interactions.customer_id = conversations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM responses JOIN conversations ON responses.conversation_id = conversations.conversation_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN responses ON customers.customer_id = responses.conversation_id;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN interactions ON products.product_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM conversations JOIN responses ON conversations.conversation_id = responses.conversation_id;
